short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get up to date news and updates from the United States and the World

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the latest Current News and Updates from Today's News. You will get the most current U.S. News, as well as news from all over the world. You can suggest news articles to be posted as well. 

This awesome extension gives you direct access to our news, as well as receiving instant notifications of updated news.
